about_the_game:
FEED THE PIT is an investigative horror game where you must communicate with Spirits of The Forest to find dead bodies for THE PIT, all while avoiding relentless horrors.

RELENTLESS MONSTROSITIES

Every visit to the forest, you'll be pursued by one of five unique monsters. Each is designed with the sole purpose of being unpredictable and persistent. Their behavior is a mystery- You'll need to take dangerous gambles and pay close attention to discover how they work, and more importantly- how to survive them.

A SPIRITUAL INVESTIGATION - THE GAMEPLAY

THE PIT hungers. To find some flesh to feed him, you'll have to perform RITUALS. These special setups are performed at each of the many landmarks in the forest. The rituals summon the spirits of the damned to help. Some may be friendly... And some may want you dead. Follow their instructions or pay the price.

Through these spirits, you'll be able to slowly eliminate spaces on your map where the body won't be found, all until only one space remains- The one where the body you seek lies. You must learn, memorize, and practice. No two investigations are the same.

WELCOME TO E.C.C.

Elijah, more properly titled 'THE PIT', yields fantastical abilities. And you've just been invited to join his Chosen Circle. We have a higher purpose to serve. A new world order to execute. For Elijah.

In FEED THE PIT, you'll be able to talk with each of the other five members. The decisions you make may yield dangerous consequences. Will you stay with the circle? Or stand against them? Cleanse the world of this society? Or cleanse the world of non-believers? Several endings lie ahead. Pick a side- or die.
